onboard.resume_later_msg:
This will be treated as your consent to store your basic information in case you need to pause the application process and return later. 
Any document uploaded in the application will not be saved. 
You'll be redirected to home page.
onboard.save_error: Sorry, there was an error saving application data

modal.content: Are you sure you want to discard the application, all the data that has been entered will be deleted ?
